dct_title_s: Guinea propia, nec non Nigritiæ vel Terræ Nigrorum maxima pars : geographis hodiernis dicta utraque Æthiopia inferior, & hujus quidem pars australis
dct_description_sm: ex delineationibus Anvillianis itineri guineensi D. de Marchais insertis secundum leges projectionis stereographicæ Hasianæ designata & edita studio & labore Homannianorum Heredum. Norimb., A. 1743 = La Guinée de même que la plus grande partie du pais des nègres : appellées par les géographes modernes Ethiopie inférieure & meridionale / tirées des morceaux géographiques de Mr. d'Anville, qu'il a insérés au voyage du Chev. de Marchais, & puis desinées suivant les loix de la nouvelle projection de feu Mr. le Prof. Has, par les Héritiers d'Homan A. 1743. ; Scale approximately 1:7,250,000 ; Relief shown pictorially ; Prime meridian: Ferro ; Includes indexed ill. depicting the dress, dwellings, and work of native Africans ; Covers west Africa from Gabon in the south to Niger, Mali, and Mauritania in the north ; Place names in Latin and French ; Norimbergæ : Homannianorum Heredum
dct_rights_sm: The images on this web site, from maps in the collection of the Melville J. Herskovits Library of African Studies and housed in the Government & Geographic Information Collection of Northwestern University Libraries are in the public domain in the United States, and as such, not subject to copyright restriction. The Libraries request users cite both the URL and Northwestern University Libraries if they wish to reproduce images from the repository. For access to higher resolution images please contact repository@northwestern.edu
